presidential style suite thinking probably mistake wasnt gentleman front desk suite yes checkin easy front desk staff nice housekeeping excellent job staff dining helpful assigned 325 equipped guests bedroom door living bedroom separate thermostats bedroom king bed sitting chairs theres desk bedroom internet jack closet bedroom average size theres chest drawers 42 lcd tv mounted wall bathroom huge tube center hotel fitness didnt rate drawbacks found minor speed internet isnt fast wired internet getting double speed wireless 04 mbps download speed evening tried contrast 55 mbps 3g phone Reviews.Content: lovely stay flying uk close airport close bothered noise planes didnt hear noise else nights stayed stayed hilton suites previous trip usa pleasantly surprised exact standard throughout chain lovely comfortable bed equipped kitchen required downside complimentary hot breakfast wasnt hot hot water tea tepid usa holidays previously prepared minor gripe staff friendly helpful definitely recommend hotel else
